description.value:
Spirit energy is the inner power that a Ninja harnesses to perform great feats of supernatural power and evoke the elements in specific ways.  A number of the Ninja’s abilities rely on spending Spirit to make them happen.  The amount of Spirit you have is equal to: 

 

  • 4 + your proficiency bonus + either your Intelligence or Presence modifier (whichever is higher)

 

You regain all of your Spirit after a long rest, and a short rest restores an amount of Spirit equal to your proficiency bonus.
